subject: Investing
title: Crypto Custody: Who Holds Your Coins?
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Crypto Custody: Who Holds Your Coins?.

hook.text: When Celsius froze withdrawals, users with millions in deposits watched helplessly as their funds vanished.

buildup.text: Custody means who physically controls the private keys to your crypto. It's the most important decision you make.

discovery.text: Self-custody gives you full control. Third-party custody (exchanges, funds) trades control for convenience.

twist.text: Regulated custodians like Coinbase Custody and Fidelity offer insurance and compliance that self-custody can't.

climax.text: Choose based on your technical skill and holdings size: self-custody for experts, regulated custody for simplicity.

punchline.text: In crypto, custody is security. Decide who holds the keys before you buy a single coin.

quiz.question: What does crypto custody determine?
options: Who controls the private keys to your assets
